name: Andrew's Detail Chunk
description:
This is a short demonstration of a virtual architecture deliberately independent of the built environment. 

Remember to click the fullscreen button after pressing "Run Game" and the project finishes loading. Audio will play automatically.

After pressing "Run Game" please wait momentarily while the project loads.

If you made an itch.io account and left a comment, or a sticky note on the Miro board about how well the project ran on your computer, that would be super!

May not be compatible with Safari browser. Only works on desktop/laptop.

Built in Unreal Engine.
